snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said he had instructed the State University of New York to make affirmative consent the rule on all 64 of its campuses.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo instructs State University of New York to overhaul its approach to preventing, investigating and prosecuting sexual assault, including making affirmative consent the rule on all 64 of its campuses; SUNY's new approach is to be put into effect in next 60 days, and will eventually lead to statewide law regulating sexual assault policies at all New York colleges and universities.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said he had instructed the State University of New York to make affirmative consent the rule on all 64 of its campuses.

headline.main: Cuomo Orders SUNY to Overhaul Its Sexual Assault Rules
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Orders SUNY to Overhaul Its Sexual Assault Rules
